Text: ENRON MIRANT SOCO ISDA AMENDMENT LTR MIR LCMTSDOC Cc MIRANT SOCO ISDA AMENDMENT LTR MIR LCMTSDOC Sara I have a couple quick comments on the letter you sent this morning In general we need to make clear that we are replacing the credit support provider under the ISDA Otherwise I am concerned that we could face a possible default under the ISDA once the VRI parental guaranty is terminated Otherwise the letter looks very agreeable to me I am anticipating we can get this executed today so please keep in touch with me in regards to any further changes you would like to make Many thanks for all your help Best regards Nicole Russell ENRON MIRANT SOCO ISDA AMENDMENT LTR MIR LCMTSDOC

ENRON MIRANT SOCO ISDA AMENDMENT LTR MIR LCMTSDOC Cc MIRANT SOCO ISDA AMENDMENT LTR MIR LCMTSDOC Sara I have a couple quick comments on the letter you sent this morning In general we need to make clear that we are replacing the credit support provider under the ISDA Otherwise I am concerned that we could face a possible default under the ISDA once the VRI parental guaranty is terminated Otherwise the letter looks very agreeable to me I am anticipating we can get this executed today so please keep in touch with me in regards to any further changes you would like to make Many thanks for all your help Best regards Nicole Russell ENRON MIRANT SOCO ISDA AMENDMENT LTR MIR LCMTSDOC
